mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MARKET ORDER BY MARKET_ID DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MARKET_ID DESC) AS RN, MARKET.* FROM MARKET
WHERE MARKET_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_LOCAL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_FOOD LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM MARKET
WHERE MARKET_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_LOCAL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_FOOD LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MARKET_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
